pullRequest.title: Remap inventories :D
pullRequest.bodyText:
A bit of a refactor to clean up the inventory method name.

Removed the instances of "inv" all over the inventory classes
Added javadocs where applicable
Corrected some inaccurate names/misleading names

nodes.bodyText: I think the original name was clearer.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,6 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2611 net/minecraft/block/entity/EnderChestBlockEntity
 	FIELD field_12005 ticks I
 	FIELD field_12006 viewerCount I
 	FIELD field_12007 animationProgress F
-	METHOD method_11218 canPlayerUse (Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Z
+	METHOD method_11218 isAccessible (Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Z

nodes.bodyText: What was wrong with add?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -18,11 +21,15 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1277 net/minecraft/inventory/BasicInventory
 		ARG 1 stack
 	METHOD method_24514 clearToList ()Ljava/util/List;
 		COMMENT Clears this inventory and return all the non-empty stacks in a list.
+	METHOD method_24825 canCombine (Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)Z
+		ARG 1 one
+		ARG 2 two
 	METHOD method_5488 removeListener (Lnet/minecraft/class_1265;)V
 		ARG 1 listener
 	METHOD method_5489 addListener (Lnet/minecraft/class_1265;)V
 		ARG 1 listener
-	METHOD method_5491 add (Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;

nodes.bodyText: InventoryListener is better IMO (or InventoryChangeListener without the D).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+CLASS net/minecraft/class_1265 net/minecraft/inventory/InventoryChangedListener

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 1 sender
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 inventory
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+CLASS net/minecraft/class_1265 net/minecraft/inventory/InventoryChangedListener
+	METHOD method_5453 onInventoryChanged (Lnet/minecraft/class_1263;)V
+		ARG 1 sender

nodes.bodyText:
The class name does not match the file name.
I think InventoryChangeListener would be better than -Callback since it fits well with other listener interfaces named *Listener in Yarn.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText:
When used on a BlockEntity for example it may not be clear what some of these methods mean.
onOpen what opened?
isValid what is valid?
In the sense of a Inventory on its own this may make sense, but not where its commonly used.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	COMMENT A special inventory interface for inventories that expose their contents to access via automation. i.e. The Hoopers.
          
          
            
            	COMMENT A special inventory interface for inventories that expose different slots for different sides, such as Hoppers.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Determines whether the given stack can be removed into this inventory at the specified slot position from the given direction.
